footer.quote: An idiot admires complexity, a genius admires simplicity

about.title: About Me
about.description:
With 5+ years of experience and direct and indirect engagement with 140K+ end-users, I am proud to have collaborated with numerous teams and service providers ranging from startups to multibillion-dollar businesses, including Meta (Facebook) and Airbnb.

I have proven multiple times to be capable of effective communication with executives, coworkers, and consumers.

Consistently, I am ready to deliver unmatched profitability, innovation, scalability, and accessibility to your team and products.

skills.title: Some of the Technologies I've mastered
skills.sub: This is not an exhaustive list, but rather a selection of my favorites.

quotes.quote: Only a fool learns from his own mistakes. The wise man learns from the mistakes of others.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: If you think hiring a professional is expensive, wait until you hire an amateur.
quotes.author: Red Adair

quotes.quote: You'll never know how good you might have become unless you try.
quotes.author: Mike Mentzer

inspiration.title: Inspirations
inspiration.description: I find inspiration from a variety of people and ideas. Please note that liking a quote or person does not represent my work or endorse any negative actions they may have taken.

projects.title: Handful of projects I've collaborated on
projects.subtitle: This is not a complete list but rather a selection of projects I have contributed to.

projectsData.title: Digimenu
projectsData.description: Digital menu manager with various features like price editing, image changes, deletion, adding categories and items.

projectsData.title: Visabird
projectsData.description: An open-source app to view tech companies from around the world that have worked with governments, embassies and issued visas in various job sectors.

projectsData.title: Ultradeal
projectsData.description: A powerful trading platform with real-time stock market data, financial maps, analytics, and advanced tools for smart investing.

projectsData.title: Abolfazl Chaman
projectsData.description: A redesigned portfolio with a clean and simple UI, hidden easter eggs, and built using modern web technologies for an interactive and engaging experience.
